anya-e0902n0:5: Pucchā – paṭhamamahāsaṁgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṁgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā dīghanikāyaṁ saṁgāyitvā tadanantaraṁ kiṁ nāma pāvacanaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu.
anya-e0902n0:6: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahāsaṁgītikāle bhante dhammasaṁgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā dīghanikāyaṁ saṁgāyitvā tadanantaraṁ majjhimaṁ nāma nikāyaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu.
anya-e0902n0:7: Pucchā – majjhimanikāyo nāma āvuso mūlapaṇṇāsako majjhima paṇṇāsako uparipaṇṇāsakoti paṇṇāsakavasena tividho, tattha kataraṁ paṇṇāsakaṁ paṭhamaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu.
anya-e0902n0:8: Vissajjanā – tīsu bhante paṇṇāsakesu mūlapaṇṇāsakaṁ nāma pāvacanaṁ dhammasaṁgāhakā mahātheravarā paṭhamaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu.
anya-e0902n0:9: Pucchā – mūlapaṇṇāsakepi āvuso pañcavaggā paṇṇāsa ca suttāni, tesu kataraṁ vaggaṁ katarañca suttaṁ paṭhamaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu.
anya-e0902n0:10: Vissajjanā – mūlapaṇṇāsake bhante pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamaṁ mūlapariyāyavaggaṁ paṇṇāsakesu ca suttesu paṭhamaṁ mūlapariyāyasuttaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu.
anya-e0902n0:11: Sādhu āvuso mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṁgītipubbaṅgamāni pucchāvissajjanakiccāni kātuṁ samārabhāma.
anya-e0902n0:13: Pucchā – tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mūlapariyāyasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:14_0: Vissajjanā – ukkaṭṭhāyaṁ bhante pañcasate brāhmaṇakulā pabbajite ārabbha bhāsitaṁ,
anya-e0902n0:14_1: pañcasatā bhante brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā bhikkhū pariyattiṁ nissāya mānaṁ uppādesuṁ,
anya-e0902n0:15: Pucchā – taṁ panāvuso suttaṁ bhagavatā katihi vārehi katihi ca antogadhapadehi vibhajitvā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:16: Vissajjanā – taṁ pana bhante mūlapariyāyasuttaṁ bhagavatā aṭṭhahi ca vārehi catuvīsatiyā ca antogadhapadehi vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:18: Pucchā – dutiyaṁ panāvuso sabbāsavasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:19: Vissajjanā – sabbāsavasuttaṁ pana bhante bhagavatā sāvatthiyaṁ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:20: Pucchā – tatthāvuso bhagavatā āsavā katihi pakārehi vibhajitvā dassitā.
anya-e0902n0:21: Vissajjanā – sattahi bhante pakārehi vibhajitvā āsavā bhagavatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:23: Pucchā – dhammadāyādasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:24: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, bhagavato ca bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tadā mahālābhasakkāro udapādi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:25: Pucchā – tatthāvuso dve anusandhayo, tesu paṭhame anusandhimhi kathaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0902n0:26_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhame bhante anusandhimhi dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā,
anya-e0902n0:26_1: atthi me tumhesu anukampā, kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṁ no āmisadāyādāti
anya-e0902n0:27: Dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā, atthi me tumhesu anukampā kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṁ, no āmisadāyādā.
anya-e0902n0:28: Pucchā – dutiye panāvuso anusandhimhi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā kīdisī dhammadesanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:29_0: Vissajjanā – dutiye pana bhante anusandhimhi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā
anya-e0902n0:29_1: satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakānaṁ vivekaṁ ananusikkhataṁ tīhi ṭhānehi gārayutaṁ,
anya-e0902n0:29_2: anusikkhantānañca tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṁsataṁ, soḷasa ca pāpake dhamme tesañca pahānāya
anya-e0902n0:31: Pucchā – bhayabheravasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:32_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante jāṇussoṇiṁ brāhmaṇaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, jāṇussoṇi
anya-e0902n0:32_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ye me bho gotama kulaputtā bhavantaṁ
anya-e0902n0:32_2: gotamaṁ uddissa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā, bhavaṁ tesaṁ gotamo pubbaṅgamo, bhavaṁ
anya-e0902n0:33: Tesaṁ gotamo bahukāro, bhavaṁ tesaṁ gotamo samādapetā, bhoto ca pana gotamassa sā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjatī”ti, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:35: Pucchā – anaṅgaṇasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kaṁ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:36: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:38: Pucchā – ākaṅkheyyasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:39: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:41: Pucchā – vatthasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:42: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:44: Pucchā – sallekhasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:45_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ mahācundaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, āyasmā mahācundo
anya-e0902n0:45_1: bhante bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “yā imā bhante anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke
anya-e0902n0:45_2: uppajjanti, attavādapaṭisaṁyuttā vā lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttā vā, ādimeva nu kho bhante
anya-e0902n0:45_3: bhikkhuno manasikaroto evametāsaṁ diṭṭhīnaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, evametāsaṁ diṭṭhīnaṁ paṭinissaggo
anya-e0902n0:46: Pucchā – tattha ca āvuso kati pariyāyā kati ca antogadhapadāni bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:47: Vissajjanā – tattha bhante pañca pariyāyā catucattālīsa ca antogadhapadāni bhagavatā vitthārena bhāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:49: Pucchā – sammādiṭṭhisuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kaṁ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:50: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:52: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0902n0:56_0: Pucchā – mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṁ panāvuso yogāvacarānaṁ bahupakārattā dīghanikāye
anya-e0902n0:56_1: ca idha cāti dvīsu nikāyesu porāṇakehi saṁgītikārehi dvikkhattuṁ saṁgāyitvā vitthārena
anya-e0902n0:56_2: patiṭṭhāpitaṁ, taṁ amhehi dīghanikāye yathānuppattavasena pucchitañca vissajjitañca.
anya-e0902n0:56_3: Tathāpi yogāvacarānaṁ bahupakārattāyeva taṁ idānipi yathānuppattavasena puna pucchissāmi,
anya-e0902n0:56_4: taṁ panetaṁ āvuso mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:57: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṁ nigame sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:58: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha ānāpānassati kāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:59_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato
anya-e0902n0:59_1: vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0902n0:59_2: so satova assasati, satova passasati, dīghaṁ vā assasanto ‘dīghaṁ assasāmī’ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:59_3: dīghaṁ vā passasanto ‘dīghaṁ passasāmī’ti pajānāti, evamādinā bhante tattha ānāpānassati
anya-e0902n0:60: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha iriyāpathakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:61_0: Vissajjanā – puna caparaṁ bhikkhave bhikkhu gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti, ṭhito
anya-e0902n0:61_1: vā ṭhitomhīti pajānāti, nisinno vā nisinnomhīti pajānāti, sayāno vā sayānomhīti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:61_2: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā iriyāpathakāyānupassanā bhāvanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:62: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha sampajaññakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:63_0: Vissajjanā – puna caparaṁ bhikkhave bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti,
anya-e0902n0:63_1: ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hoti, samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
anya-e0902n0:63_2: sampajānakārī hoti, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti, uccārapassāvakamme
anya-e0902n0:63_3: sampajānakārī hoti, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī
anya-e0902n0:63_4: hoti, evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha sampajaññakāyānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:64: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha paṭikūlamanasikārakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:65_0: Vissajjanā – puna caparaṁ bhikkhave bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ uddhaṁ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā
anya-e0902n0:65_1: tacapariyantaṁ pūraṁ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati atthi imasmiṁ kāye kesālomā
anya-e0902n0:65_2: nakhā dantā taco evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā paṭikūlamanasikārakāyānupassanā
anya-e0902n0:66: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha dhātumanasikārakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:67_0: Vissajjanā – puna caparaṁ bhikkhave bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ yathāṭhitaṁ yathāpaṇihitaṁ
anya-e0902n0:67_1: dhātuso paccavekkhati atthi imasmiṁ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu
anya-e0902n0:67_2: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā dhātumanasikārakāyānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:68: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha nava sivathikakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:69_0: Vissajjanā – puna caparaṁ bhikkhave bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṁ sivathikāya
anya-e0902n0:69_1: chaḍḍitaṁ ekāhamataṁ vā dvīhamataṁ vā tīhamataṁ vā uddhumātakaṁ vinīlakaṁ vipubbakajātaṁ
anya-e0902n0:69_2: so imameva kāyaṁ upasaṁharati “ayampi kho kāyo evaṁdhammo evaṁbhāvī evaṁanatīto”ti
anya-e0902n0:69_3: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā nava sivathikakāyānupassanā bhāvanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:70: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha vedanānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:71_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sukhaṁ vā vedanaṁ vedayamāno “sukhaṁ vedanaṁ
anya-e0902n0:71_1: vedayāmī”ti pajānāti, dukkhaṁ vā vedanaṁ vedayamāno “dukkha vedanaṁ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:71_2: adukkhamasukhaṁ vā vedanaṁ vedayamāno “adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:71_3: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā vedanānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:72: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha cittānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:73_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ “sarāgaṁ citta”nti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:73_1: vītarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ “vītarāgaṁ citta”nti pajānāti, sadosaṁ vā vītadosaṁ vā samohaṁ
anya-e0902n0:73_2: vā vītamohaṁ vā saṁkhittaṁ vā cittaṁ “saṁkhittaṁ citta”nti pajānāti, vikkhittaṁ vā
anya-e0902n0:73_3: cittaṁ “vikkhittaṁ citta”nti pajānāti, evamādinā tattha bhagavatā cittānupassanā
anya-e0902n0:74: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha dhammānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā, taṁ saṅkhepamatteneva vissajjehi.
anya-e0902n0:75: Vissajjanā – idha bhikkhave bhikkhu dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati, pañcasu nīvaraṇesu evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā pañcahi pabbehi dhammānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:77: Pucchā – cūḷanasīhanādasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:78_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante parihīnalābhasakkāre nānātitthiye ārabbha bhāsitaṁ,
anya-e0902n0:78_1: nānātitthiyā bhante parihīnalābhasakkārā tesu tesu ṭhānesu parideviṁsu, catasso ca
anya-e0902n0:78_2: bhannte parisā bhagavato ekamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:80: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mahāsīhanādasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:81_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante sunakkhattaṁ licchaviputtaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, sanukkhatto
anya-e0902n0:81_1: bhante licchaviputto acirapakkanto hoti imasmā dhammavinayā, so vesāliyaṁ parisati
anya-e0902n0:81_2: evaṁ vācaṁ bhāsati “natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso,
anya-e0902n0:81_3: takkapariyāhataṁ samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti vīmaṁsānucaritaṁ sayaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:81_4: Yassa ca khvāssa atthāya dhammo desito, so niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti,
anya-e0902n0:81_5: etamatthaṁ bhante āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato ārocesi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:82_0: Pucchā – kati panāvuso tattha bhagavatā tathāgatassa tathāgatabalāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni,
anya-e0902n0:82_1: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṁ nadati,
anya-e0902n0:83_0: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante tathāgatassa tathāgatabalāni bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitāni,
anya-e0902n0:83_1: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṁ nadati,
anya-e0902n0:84_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā catuverajjañāṇāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni, yehi
anya-e0902n0:84_1: vesārajjehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṁ nadati,
anya-e0902n0:85_0: Vissajjanā – khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ime āsavā aparikkhīṇāti tatra vata maṁ samaṇo
anya-e0902n0:85_1: vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti
anya-e0902n0:85_2: nimittametaṁ sāriputta na samanupassāmi, etamahaṁ sāriputta nimittaṁ asamanupassanto
anya-e0902n0:85_3: khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi. Evamādinā bhante tattha catuvesārajjañāṇāni
anya-e0902n0:86: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā pañcagatiparicchedañāṇaṁ vibhajitvā pakāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:87_0: Vissajjanā – pañca kho imā sāriputta gatiyo, katamā pañca, nirayo tiracchānayoni
anya-e0902n0:87_1: pettivisayo manussā devā, evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṁ
anya-e0902n0:88: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha tathāgato attano paññāveyyattiyā aparihāniṁ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:89_0: Vissajjanā – santi kho pana sāriputta eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṁvādino evaṁdiṭṭhino
anya-e0902n0:89_1: yāvadevāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso daharo hoti, evamādinā bhante tattha tathāgato attano paññāveyyattiyā
anya-e0902n0:91: Pucchā – mahādukkhakkhandhasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:92_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññatitthiye ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, sambahulā bhante aññatitthiyā
anya-e0902n0:92_1: bhikkhū etadavocuṁ “samaṇo āvuso gotamo kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapeti, mayampi kāmānaṁ
anya-e0902n0:92_2: pariññaṁ paññapema, samaṇo āvuso gotamo rūpānaṁ vedanānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapeti, mayampi
anya-e0902n0:92_3: rūpānaṁ vedanānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapema, idha no āvuso ko viseso, ko adhippayāso, kiṁ
anya-e0902n0:92_4: nānākaraṇaṁ samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākaṁ vā yadidaṁ dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesanaṁ
anya-e0902n0:92_5: anusāsaniyā vā anusāsani”nti, etamatthaṁ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0902n0:94: Pucchā – cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:95_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṁ mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, mahānāmo
anya-e0902n0:95_1: bhante sakko bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “dīgharattāhaṁ bhante bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:95_2: evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi ‘lobho cittassa upakkileso, doso cittassa upakkileso,
anya-e0902n0:95_3: moho cittassa upakkileso’ti, evañcāhaṁ bhante bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi ‘lobho
anya-e0902n0:95_4: cittassa upakkileso, doso cittassa upakkileso, moho cittassa upakkileso’ti. Atha
anya-e0902n0:95_5: ca pana me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, dosadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya
anya-e0902n0:95_6: tiṭṭhanti, mohadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, tassa mayhaṁ bhante evaṁ hoti
anya-e0902n0:95_7: ‘ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṁ appahino, yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya
anya-e0902n0:95_8: tiṭṭhanti, dosadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, mohadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya
anya-e0902n0:97: Pucchā – anumānasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kaṁ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:98: Vissajjanā – bhaggesu bhante susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane āyasmatā mahāmoggallānattherena sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:100: Pucchā – cetokhilasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:101: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:103: Pucchā – vanapatthasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:104: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:106: Pucchā – madhupiṇḍikasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:107_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante daṇḍapāṇiṁ sakkaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, daṇḍapāṇi bhante
anya-e0902n0:107_1: sakko bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “kiṁ vādī samaṇo kimakkhāyī”ti, tasmiṁ
anya-e0902n0:109: Pucchā – dvedhāvitakkasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:110: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:112: Pucchā – vitakkasaṇṭhānasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:113: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:115: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena kakacūpamasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:116_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ moḷiyaphaggunaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, āyasmā
anya-e0902n0:116_1: bhante moḷiyaphagguno bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ ativelaṁ saṁsaṭṭho viharati, tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0902n0:117: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso āyasmato moḷiyaphaggunassa taṁ bhagavato ovādaṁ sutvā kathaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ, kathañja bhagavā uttari bhikkhūna ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n0:118_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante moḷiyaphaggunassa bhagavato imaṁ ovādaṁ sutvā bhikkhunisaṁsaggato
anya-e0902n0:118_1: oramissāmi viramissāmītipi cittaṁ na uppannaṁ, asaṁvarameva bhante cittaṁ uppannaṁ,
anya-e0902n0:118_2: bhagavā ca bhante ārādhayiṁsu vata me bhikkhave bhikkhū ekaṁ samayaṁ cittaṁ, evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:119: Ubhato daṇḍakena cepi bhikkhave kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṁ.
anya-e0902n0:121: Pucchā – alagaddūpamasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:122_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ,
anya-e0902n0:122_1: ariṭṭhassa bhante bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ
anya-e0902n0:122_2: “tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājādāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
anya-e0902n0:122_3: te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:123: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso āyasmato ariṭṭhassa gaddhabādhipubbassa kathaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi, kathañca bhagavā uttari bhikkhunaṁ dhammadesanaṁ pavattesi.
anya-e0902n0:124_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa “kiñcāpi maṁ
anya-e0902n0:124_1: bhagavā moghapurisavādena vadesi, na kho pana me maggaphalānaṁ upanissayo na hoti,
anya-e0902n0:124_2: svāhaṁ ārabhitvā ghaṭṭetvā maggaphalāni nibbattessāmī”ti, evaṁ kho bhante cetaso
anya-e0902n0:124_3: parivitakko udapādi, bhagavā ca bhante duppaññassa alagaddūpamaṁ dassetvā alagaddūpamaṁ
anya-e0902n0:124_4: pariyattiñca dassetvā paññavato alagaddūpamāya ca kullūpamāya ca paññavato nissaraṇapariyattiṁ
anya-e0902n0:124_5: dassetvā cha ca diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni, tesañca channaṁ diṭṭhiṭṭhānānaṁ viniveṭhanākāraṁ
anya-e0902n0:124_6: dassetvā pariyosāne ca khandhakammaṭṭhānaṁ arahattanikūṭena dassetvā uttari bhikkhūnaṁ
anya-e0902n0:126: Pucchā – dhammikasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:127_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ kumārakassapaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā
anya-e0902n0:127_1: bhante kumārakassapo bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vammikapañhaṁ pucchi, tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0902n0:129: Pucchā – rathavinītasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:130: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmatā ca sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā ca puṇṇena mantāṇiputtena aññamaññaṁ pucchāvissajjanavasena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:132: Pucchā – nivāpasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:133: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:134: Pucchā – imasmiṁ āvuso sutte ko nivāpo ko nevāpiko kā nevāpikaparisā kā migajātā kathañcetissā upamāya attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0902n0:135_0: Vissajjanā – imasmiṁ bhante sutte nivāpoti kho bhante pañcannetaṁ kāmaguṇānaṁ adhivacanaṁ,
anya-e0902n0:135_1: nevāpikoti kho bhante mārassetaṁ pāpimato adhivacanaṁ, nevāpikaparisāti kho bhante
anya-e0902n0:135_2: māraparisāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ, migajātāti kho bhante samaṇabrāhmaṇānametaṁ adhivacanaṁ,
anya-e0902n0:135_3: imasmiṁ bhante sutte etassa attho evaṁ daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0902n0:137: Pucchā – kenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena pāsarāsisuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:138_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0902n0:138_1: bhikkhū rammakassa brāhmaṇassa assame bhagavantaṁ ārabbha dhammiyā kathāya sannisīdiṁsu,
anya-e0902n0:139: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso tesaṁ sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sannisinnānaṁ kīdisaṁ dhammakathaṁ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:140_0: Vissajjanā – sādhu bhikkhave etaṁ kho bhikkhave tumhākaṁ patirūpaṁ kulaputtānaṁ saddhā
anya-e0902n0:140_1: agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitānaṁ, yaṁ tumhe dhammiyā kathāya sannisīdeyyātha, sannipatitānaṁ
anya-e0902n0:140_2: vo bhikkhave dvayaṁ karaṇīyaṁ dhammī vā kathā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo. Dvemā bhikkhave
anya-e0902n0:140_3: pariyesanā ariyā ca pariyesanā anariyā ca pariyesanā. Evamādinā bhante bhagavā sannipatitānaṁ
anya-e0902n0:140_4: tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ariyapariyesanañca anariyapariyesanañca vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0902n0:141: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā attanāpi anariyapariyesanaṁ pahāya ariyapariyesanāya pariyesitabhāvaṁ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:142_0: Vissajjanā – ahampi sudaṁ bhikkhave pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova
anya-e0902n0:142_1: samāno attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṁyeva pariyesāmi, attanā jarādhammo byādhidhammo
anya-e0902n0:142_2: maraṇadhammo sokadhammo saṁkilesadhammo samāno saṁkilesadhammaṁyeva pariyesāmi. Evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:142_3: bhante bhagavā attanāpi anariyapariyesanaṁ pahāya ariyapariyesanāya pariyesitabhāvaṁ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:143: Pucchā – evaṁ paṭhamābhisambuddhassa āvuso bhagavato ajapālanigrodharukkhamūle nisinnassa dhammadesanāya katasanniṭṭhānassa kīdiso
anya-e0902n0:144: Cetaso parivitakko udapādi, kathañca dhammadesanāya cārikā ahosi, kathañca paṭhamā dhammadesanā ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:145_0: Vissajjanā – “kassa nu kho ahaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ, ko imaṁ dhammaṁ khippameva
anya-e0902n0:145_1: ājānissatī”ti evaṁ kho bhante bhagavato paṭhamābhisambuddhassa ajapālanigrodhamūle
anya-e0902n0:145_2: dhammadesanāya katasanniṭṭhānassa parivitakko udapādi, atha bhante bhagavā uruvelāyaṁ
anya-e0902n0:145_3: yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena bārāṇasī, tena padasāyeva cārikaṁ pakkāmi dhammadesanāya,
anya-e0902n0:145_4: dveme bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā, katame dve, yo cāyaṁ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo
anya-e0902n0:145_5: hīno gāmmo pothujjaniko anariyo anattasaṁhito, evamādinā bhante bhagavato paṭhamā dhammadesanā ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:150: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā pāsarāsiupamāya taṁ desanaṁ pariniṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0902n0:151_0: Vissajjanā – pañcime bhikkhave kāmaguṇā, katame pañca, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā
anya-e0902n0:151_1: kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā. Sotaviññeyyā saddā. Ghānaviññeyyā gandhā.
anya-e0902n0:151_2: Jivhāviññeyyā rasā. Kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā
anya-e0902n0:151_3: rajanīyā. Ime kho bhikkhave pañca kāmaguṇā. Ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
anya-e0902n0:151_4: vā ime kāmaguṇe gathitā mucchitā ajjhopannā anādīnavadassāvino anissaraṇapaññā paribhuñjanti,
anya-e0902n0:151_5: te evamassu veditabbā “anayamāpannā byāsanamāpannā yathākāmakaraṇīyā pāpimato”, evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:153: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:154_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante jāṇussoṇiṁ brāhmaṇaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Jāṇussoṇi
anya-e0902n0:154_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā yāvatako ahosi pilotikena paribbājakena
anya-e0902n0:154_2: saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo, taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:155: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā hatthipadopamaṁ vitthārena paripūretvā desesi.
anya-e0902n0:156_0: Vissajjanā – “na kho brāhmaṇa ettāvatā hatthipadopamo vitthārena paripūro hoti, api
anya-e0902n0:156_1: ca brāhmaṇa yathā hatthipadopamo vitthārena paripūro hoti, taṁ suṇāhi sādhukaṁ manasikarohi
anya-e0902n0:156_2: bhāsissāmī”ti, evamādinā bhante bhagavā hatthipadopamaṁ paripūretvā brāhmaṇassa jāṇussoṇissa desesi.
anya-e0902n0:158: Pucchā – mahāhatthipadopamasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kaṁ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:159: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:161: Pucchā – mahāsāropamasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:162: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, devadatto bhante saṅghaṁ bhinditvā ruhiruppādakammaṁ katvā acirapakkanto hoti, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:164: Pucchā – cūḷasāropamasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:165: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante piṅgalakocchaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, piṅgalakoccho bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:167: Pucchā – cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:168: Vissajjanā – nābhike bhante gosiṅgasālavanadāye āyasmatā anuruddhattherena saddhiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:170: Pucchā – mahāgosiṅgasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:171: Vissajjanā – gosiṅgasālavanadāye bhante āyasmatā ca sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:173: Pucchā – mahāgopālakasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:174: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:176: Pucchā – cūḷagopālakasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:177: Vissajjanā – vajjīsu bhante ukkacelāyaṁ gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:179: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena cūḷasaccakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:180_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante saccakaṁ nigaṇṭhaputtaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, saccako nigaṇṭhaputto
anya-e0902n0:180_1: mahatiyā licchaviparisāya saddhiṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ
anya-e0902n0:180_2: etadavoca “kathaṁ pana bhavaṁ gotamo sāvake vineti, kathaṁ bhāgā ca pana bhoto gotamassa
anya-e0902n0:180_3: sāvakesu anusāsanī bahulā pavattatī”ti, atha bhante bhagavatā aniccavāde ca anattavāde
anya-e0902n0:180_4: ca pakāsite saccako nigaṇṭhaputto pathavīupamaṁ dassetvā attano attavādaṁ pakāsesi,
anya-e0902n0:181: Pucchā – evaṁ āvuso saccakena nigaṇṭhaputtena mahāpathavīupamaṁ dassetvā attavāde pakāsite kathaṁ bhagavā taṁ attavādaṁ puna patiṭṭhāpetvā samanuyuñji samanugāhi samanubhāsi.
anya-e0902n0:182_0: Vissajjanā – “nanu tvaṁ aggivessana evaṁ vadesi, rūpaṁ me attā, vedanā me attā, saññā
anya-e0902n0:182_1: me attā, saṅkhārā me attā, viññāṇaṁ me attā”ti, evaṁ kho bhante bhagavā saccakaṁ
anya-e0902n0:182_2: nigaṇṭhaputtaṁ taṁ attavādaṁ patiṭṭhāpesi. Patiṭṭhāpetvā ca pana bhante bhagavā “tena
anya-e0902n0:182_3: hi aggivessana taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi, yathā te khameyya, tathā taṁ byākareyyāsī”ti
anya-e0902n0:182_4: evamādinā bhante bhagavā saccakaṁ nigaṇṭhaputtaṁ samanuyuñji samanugāhi samanubhāsi.
anya-e0902n0:183: Pucchā – evaṁ kho āvuso saccake nigaṇṭhaputte tuṇhībhūte adhomukhe pajjhāyante appaṭibhāne nisinne dummukho nāma licchaviputto bhagavantaṁ kiṁ vacanaṁ avoca.
anya-e0902n0:184_0: Vissajjanā – evaṁ bhante saccake nigaṇṭhaputte tuṇhībhūte maṅkubhūte pattakkhandhe
anya-e0902n0:184_1: adhomukhe pajjhāyante appaṭibhāne dummukho licchaviputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “upamā
anya-e0902n0:185: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṁ kīdisaṁ pañhaṁ pucchi, kathañca taṁ bhagavā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:186_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante saccako nigaṇṭhaputto dummukhaṁ licchaviṁ apasādetvā
anya-e0902n0:186_1: bhagavantaṁ sekhañca asekhañca pañhaṁ pucchi, bhagavā ca bhante “idha aggivessana
anya-e0902n0:186_2: mama sāvako yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ
anya-e0902n0:186_3: vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā” evamādinā sekhañca asekhañca
anya-e0902n0:187: Buddho so bhagavā bodhāya dhammaṁ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:188: Danto so bhagavā damathāya dhammaṁ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:189: Santo so bhagavā samathāya dhammaṁ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:190: Tiṇṇo so bhagavā taraṇāya dhammaṁ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:191: Parinibbuto so bhagavā parinibbānāya dhammaṁ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:193: Pucchā – mahāsaccakasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:194_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante saccakaṁyeva nigaṇṭhaputtaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Saccako
anya-e0902n0:194_1: bhante nigaṇṭhaputto aparadivase bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato sāvake āsajja
anya-e0902n0:194_2: bhāvanādvayapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ vācaṁ bhāsati, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:195: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā saccakaṁ nigaṇṭhaputtaṁ paṭipucchitvā bhāvanādvayaṁ vibhajja kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:196_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante bhagavā “kinti pana te aggivessana kāyabhāvanā sutā”ti
anya-e0902n0:196_1: evamādinā saccakaṁ nigaṇṭhaputtaṁ paṭipucchitvā, kathañca aggivessana abhāvitakāyo
anya-e0902n0:196_2: ca hoti abhāvitacitto ca evamādinā bhāvanādvayaṁ vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:197_0: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṁ kiṁ vacanaṁ avoca, kathañca
anya-e0902n0:197_1: bhagavā padhānakāle attanāanubhūtapubbā paramukkaṁsagatā sukhadukkhavedanāyo pakāsesi,
anya-e0902n0:197_2: yāpi bhagavato cittaṁ na pariyādāya aṭṭhaṁsu.
anya-e0902n0:198_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “na hi nūna
anya-e0902n0:198_1: bhoto gotamassa uppajjati, tathā rūpā sukhāvedanā, yathārūpā uppannā sukhāvedanā
anya-e0902n0:198_2: cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya, na hi nūna bhoto gotamassa uppajjati tathārūpā dukkhā
anya-e0902n0:198_3: vedanā, yathārūpā uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyyā”ti atha kho bhagavā
anya-e0902n0:198_4: “kiñhi no siyā aggivessana, idha me aggivessena pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa
anya-e0902n0:198_5: bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi, evamādinā bhante bhagavā padhānakāle attanānubhūtapubbā
anya-e0902n0:198_6: paramukkaṁsagatā sukhadukkhavedanāyo vitthārena, yāpi bhagavato cittaṁ na pariyādāya aṭṭhaṁsu.
anya-e0902n0:200: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:201_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Sakko bhante
anya-e0902n0:201_1: devānamindo bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “kittāvatānukho bhante bhikkhu saṁkhittena
anya-e0902n0:201_2: taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno
anya-e0902n0:201_3: seṭṭho devamanussāna”nti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:202: Kittāvatā nu kho bhante bhikkhu saṁkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyāsāno seṭṭho devamanussānaṁ –
anya-e0902n0:204: Pucchā – mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:205_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sātiṁ bhikkhuṁ kevaṭṭaputtaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Sātissa
anya-e0902n0:205_1: bhante bhikkhuno kevaṭṭaputtassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti “tathāhaṁ
anya-e0902n0:205_2: bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati
anya-e0902n0:206: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso bhagavā kathaṁ bhikkhū āmantetvā ca paṭipucchitvā ca anattabhāvadīpikaṁ dhammakathaṁ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:207_0: Vissajjanā – atha bhante bhagavā bhikkhū “taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave, apināyaṁ sāti
anya-e0902n0:207_1: bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto usmīkatopi ismiṁ dhammavinaye”ti āmantetvā, tumhepi me bhikkhave
anya-e0902n0:207_2: evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāthatyādinā bhikkhū paṭipucchitvā ca yaṁ yadeva bhikkhave
anya-e0902n0:207_3: paccayaṁ paṭicca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, tena teneva viññāṇaṁ tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0902n0:207_4: cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0902n0:207_5: evamādinā bhante anattatādīpikaṁ dhammiṁ kathaṁ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:209: Pucchā – mahāassapurasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:210_0: Vissajjanā – aṅgesu bhante assapure nāma aṅgānaṁ nigame bahū manusse saddhe pasanne
anya-e0902n0:210_1: ārabbbha bhāsitaṁ. Bahū bhante manussā saddhā pasannā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sakkaccaṁ upaṭṭhahiṁsu,
anya-e0902n0:210_2: sabbakālañca ratanattayapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ vaṇṇakathaṁyeva kathayiṁsu. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:211: Pucchā – katame āvuso tattha bhagavatā dhammā samaṇakaraṇā ca brāhmaṇakaraṇā ca uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:212_1: parisuddhājīvo indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojanemattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo satisampajaññaṁ
anya-e0902n0:212_2: nīvaraṇappahānaṁ cattāri ca jhānāni tisso ca vijjā ime kho bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:212_3: samaṇakaraṇā ca brāhmaṇakaraṇā ca uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītā dhammā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:214: Pucchā – cūḷaassapurasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā katta kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:215: Vissajjanā – tasmiṁyeva bhante assapure nigame teyeva manusse saddhe pasanne ārabbha bhāsitaṁ, tasmiṁyeva bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:216: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā ca assamaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā ca vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:217_0: Vissajjanā – “kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu na samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno hoti,
anya-e0902n0:217_1: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhuno abhijjhālussa abhijjhā appahīnā hoti, byāpannacittassa
anya-e0902n0:217_2: byāpādo appahīno hotī”ti evamādinā ca. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṁ
anya-e0902n0:217_3: paṭipanno hoti, yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhuno abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīnā hoti,
anya-e0902n0:217_4: byāpannacittassa byāpādo pahīno hoti evamādinā ca bhante bhagavatā tattha samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā
anya-e0902n0:217_5: ca assamaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā ca vitthārena vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:219: Pucchā – sāleyyakasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:220_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante sālāyaṁ nāma brāhmaṇagāme sāleyyake brāhmaṇagahapatike
anya-e0902n0:220_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Sāleyyakā bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ
anya-e0902n0:220_2: “ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ
anya-e0902n0:220_3: maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti, ko pana bho gotama hetu ko
anya-e0902n0:220_4: paccayo, yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī”ti.
anya-e0902n0:222: Pucchā – verañjakasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:223_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante verañjake brāhmaṇagahapatike ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Verañjakā
anya-e0902n0:223_1: bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ “ko nu kho bho gotama
anya-e0902n0:223_2: hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ
anya-e0902n0:223_3: vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti, ko pana bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce
anya-e0902n0:223_4: sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī”ti. Tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0902n0:225: Pucchā – mahāvedallasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:226: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmatā mahākoṭṭhikena puṭṭhena āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:228: Pucchā – cūḷavedallasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:229: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante visākhena upāsakena puṭṭhāya dhammadinnāya theriyā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:231: Pucchā – cūḷadhammasamādānasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:232: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:234: Pucchā – mahādhammasamādānasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:235: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:237: Pucchā – vīmaṁsakasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:238: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:240: Pucchā – kosambiyasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:241_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante kosambike bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Kosambikā bhante
anya-e0902n0:241_1: bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti.
anya-e0902n0:243: Pucchā – brahmanimantanikasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:244: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:246: Pucchā – māratajjanīyasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0902n0:247_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena
anya-e0902n0:247_1: māraṁ pāpimantaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Māro bhante pāpimā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa
anya-e0902n0:247_2: kucchigato hoti koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭho. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
